ygData.subject: Re: Bard Axe from PoH!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Bards can train 1 point in 2H Blunt and 2H slash. and we can in fact equip any 2h weapon that says BRD and has our race listed. This was supposedly done so GMs
ygData.messageBody:
Bards can train 1 point in 2H Blunt and 2H slash.
and we can in fact equip any 2h weapon that says BRD and has our race
listed. This was supposedly done so GMs could equip certain equipment.

The easy way to play with it is to get a glowing wooden crook, kind of
amusing. Who knows in a few months, maybe all the warriors/paladins/etc
will have them and a bard can loot it for laughs. Equipped it looks like
an executioner's axe. ;)

Ariell Thunderwolf, Karana
